channel.title: Boston Women in Bioinformatics's Events
channel.description: Stay updated with our upcoming events and meetups

item.title: New Year, New Connections Social
item.content:encoded:
When: Thursday, January 15, 2026 at 10:30 PM

Where: C-Side Bar, CambridgeSide, 100 Cambridgeside Pl, Cambridge, Massachusetts

Are you a bioinformatics enthusiast looking to meet and mingle with fellow professionals in a relaxed and unscripted environment? Join us for a relaxed, no-pressure social event designed for one thing: connecting with other women in bioinformatics. There's no formal program or presentations‚Äîjust an opportunity to have real conversations, expand your network, and meet the people who make up Boston's vibrant bioinformatics community.

We'll have exclusive 10-year anniversary swag available for anyone who missed our recent celebration. We're also working on arranging professional headshots with a photographer, perfect timing for refreshing your LinkedIn profile or website. More details on photo sessions coming soon!

‚ÄãWhether you're looking to make new professional connections, reconnect with colleagues, or simply spend an evening with ladies who understand what "debugging a Nextflow pipeline" means, we'd love to see you there. Since the bar is located in a food court, feel free to grab dinner or snacks‚Äîyou're not limited to just drinks!

‚ÄãCome as you are. Stay as long as you'd like (until 9pm when the mall closes). Leave with new connections.

What to Know Before You Register

  • This event is intended for individuals who identify as women and gender-diverse individuals . üë©‚Äçüî¨
  • Each guest will be responsible for purchasing their own meal and/or beverages. üçΩÔ∏è

How to find us

We‚Äôll be gathering at the C-Side Bar in the CambridgeSide Mall food court, a lively and accessible spot right in the heart of East Cambridge. If you're taking the MBTA Green Line, hop off at Lechmere Station‚Äîit‚Äôs just a short walk to the mall entrance. Driving in? The mall offers plenty of garage parking with flexible hourly rates and extended hours, so you‚Äôll have no trouble finding a spot.

The food court features a variety of dining options, so feel free to grab a bite, a beverage, and stay awhile!
